sentences.tran: 当在2010年1月重新发布的时候，她会变得更高和更瘦，但仍然会穿着和第一次相似的服饰。
sentences.tranLocal: When re-released in January 2010, she will be taller and thinner, but still wearing an outfit similar to her first one.

sentences.tran: 其思想是按照外部时钟的步调在更短的时间内完成一项工作，即便要以更复杂的硬件和编程为代价也在所不惜。
sentences.tranLocal: The idea is to finish a job in a shorter time as measured by an external clock, even if at the cost of more hardware and programming complexity.

sentences.tran: 这篇文章是从一本较长的新书中摘选出来的。
sentences.tranLocal: The article was abstracted from a longer new book.

sentences.tran: 当她抬头看向我所指的人时——也许从我的声音里就已经听出来了——忽然，他看着她，那个最瘦的，最孩子气的，也许是最年轻的男孩。
sentences.tranLocal: As she looked up to see who I meant — though already knowing, probably, from my tone — suddenly he looked at her, the thinner one, the boyish one, the youngest, perhaps.

list.tran: 薄的；瘦的；稀薄的；微弱的

sentences.tran: 正如在太阳上所进行的反应一样，第二阶段连锁反应将氢原子聚合成较重的氦原子并在这一过程中释放出巨大的能量。
sentences.tranLocal: Just as in the sun, the chain reaction in the second stage fuses the hydrogen atoms into heavier helium atoms and releases vast amounts of energy in the process.

sentences.tran: 这个动物要比杰拉德想象的要重些，当勃兹曼顶着雪走出来并把它放在杰拉德座位旁边时，箱子里动物的重量神秘的从箱子的一角偏向另一角。
sentences.tranLocal: The animal was heavier than Gerard had expected, shifting its weight mysteriously from one corner of the box to another as he carried it out into the snow and set it on the seat beside him.

sentences.tran: 随着世界气候的变迁， 恐龙绝迹了， 但许多较小的动物却继续活了下来。 这就是适者生存。
sentences.tranLocal: With the changes in the world's climate, dinosaurs died, but many smaller animals lived on. It was the survival of the fittest.

sentences.tran: 那么你一定比我们强壮。
sentences.tranLocal: Then you must be stronger than us.

sentences.tran: “这肯定是不可取的，但如果它意味着一份解决了问题严重性的更强有力的协议，那也未必是坏事，”他说。
sentences.tranLocal: This is certainly not desirable, but if it meant a stronger agreement that addressed the seriousness of the problem, it may not be that bad.

sentences.tran: 感谢美国，我不再害怕身患艾滋，我不在害怕谈论艾滋，是你让我变得强大，是你我们相互鼓舞支持使得彼此的生活更美好。
